TEXT.TITLE: ANCHOR FINANCIAL <AFCX> TO MAKE ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Anchor Financial Corp said it has agreed to acquire Waccamaw State Bank of Surfside Beach, S.C., in an exchange of 1.435 Anchor shares for each Waccamaw share, subject to regulatory and shareholder approvals. Waccamaw had assets of 22.8 mln dlrs as of March 31. Reuter
